search.general: Cadastral map. Shows property and lot lines, lot numbers and owners' names.

Date of situation varies. Base map seems to have been made upon sale of property to Smyth after 1826--compare included text quoted below. Included text and accompanying material contains dates running to 1836 and, retrospectively, to 1810.
Date of ms. based on dates of situation.

Includes verso text in pencil: "Consigned to [?] C. [Stewart] 48 lots of land owned by Math[ias] Ward conveyed to [David Dunham] 27th Jan 1810 /Danl Jackson +c to F[?] Dub[uas] 1826 / [?] [?] to C. Smyth 218.186"

Includes additional verso texts: "C[elia] Smyth to Ey[ekue] J. Hone to [Wm. H.] Mills 124.351" "9 lots of 25 feet each on the southerly side of Stewart L[e being] 125 feet from the northwesterly corner of a piece of parcel of land belonging to P[ilo] Dob." Pencil sketch shows names of Dob, Graham, [?], Mathias Ward. Additional deed nos. "223.158" and "851.353."
